summary: The diff implements all three requirements with comprehensive error logging, privileged role approval flow, and error handling utilities. All requested features are present in the modified files.

hallucinated_features.description: Added 'sales' role to the privilegedRoles array alongside admin, inventoryManager, and accountant
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest specifically mentions only three privileged roles (admin, inventoryManager, accountant), but the code includes 'sales' as a fourth privileged role requiring approval

hallucinated_features.description: Created a new utility module for parsing approval and profile save errors with detailed error type categorization
hallucinated_features.reason: While REQ-3 requested error logging, the creation of a separate utility file (approvalErrors.ts) with complex error type classification (authorization, missing-profile, rejected, role-restriction, validation, network, unknown) goes beyond the requested logging functionality

hallucinated_features.description: Added sophisticated error type detection logic for various backend scenarios including authorization, missing profile, rejection states, and actor authentication errors
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-3 requested distinguishing between network failures, backend errors, and validation issues, but the implementation adds several additional error categories (authorization, missing-profile, rejected, role-restriction) that were not specified
